utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, it’s me. I know you can’t stand to be in the same room as me, so I just thought I’d try and apologize over the phone. All I…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look I never should have kissed your girlfriend, but I’m…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Stop callin’!!

utterance.speaker: Voice
utterance.content: Hey! Hey! Hey! This is 92.3, WXRK, K-Rock for our $1,000 daily challenge.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Voice
utterance.content: What is the name of your roommate who is very, very sorry and would do anything…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Aww, turkey! Aww, giving thanks! Aww!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Look everyone, it’s the spirit of Thanksgiving!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So are things with you and Joey any better?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: They couldn’t be worse. I spent eight hours calling him last night, just trying to get him to talk to me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh wow, eight hours? So you could probably really use one of those plug-in telephone headsets huh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Should we all expect Christmas gifts that can be stolen from your office?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You shouldn’t.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Speaking of Christmas, umm since Monica and I are starting a new business and have like no money, umm, this year maybe we could do secret Santa, and then we each only buy one gift. And-and there’s the added mystery of who gets who.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who gets whom. I don’t know why I do that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I’m gonna take a nap, turkey makes me sleepy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We haven’t eaten yet!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know, but all that work you’re doing to get it ready, I just…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, by any chance did either of pick uh Rachel for your secret Santa, ‘cause I wanna trade for her.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I picked her! Oh thank God you want her! Ooh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow! Why do you want to get rid of her so badly?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Because she exchanges every gift she ever gets, it’s like impossible to get her something she likes. Come on, let’s trade!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh that’s not true! That’s not true! I got her that backpack and she loved it! I remember how much she was crying the day when that big dog ran off with it… Oh, there was no big dog. All right this sucks! I already got her this briefcase, and I had R.G. put on it… Her initials…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, maybe you could give to somebody else. Ooh, like Ross Geller.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Op, y'know what though, it’s kind’ve a girlie briefcase.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who cares? He works in a museum!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, what time is it? The big game is about to start!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You don’t have to do that, Ross and Joey aren’t here, you can watch the parade if you want.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What is wrong with this freezer?! Ow! Ow!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: God, what happened?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, ice just got in my eye!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: People are trying to sleep in here!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica got ice in her eye, and it hurts.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Open it up, let me see.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, y’know what, I can’t, it really kills.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well maybe you should put some ice on it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, God it looks bad.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey, maybe we should take you to a doctor.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, my eye doctor is Richard! I can’t go to him when I don’t have a boyfriend!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He’s really picky about his patients.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Honey, you’ve got to go. What’s his office number?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Like I remember his office number! Speed dial 7.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi! Yeah, I’m calling on behalf of Monica Geller’s eye, and is um, is Richard Burke in today. He’s out of town, but does she want to see the on-call doctor?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes! She’s very excited about that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This is so cool, ‘til Monica gets back, it’s like I’m head chef and I get to make all the decisions.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey-hey, I thought she told you to follow the recipe exactly!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, get out of my kitchen!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right! Okay! I think I am making some progress with Joey, when I went into the apartment he went straight into his bedroom but he only slammed the door once! I mean yeah, he gave me the finger while doing it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right I… I gotta call my mom and ask her a left handed cooking question.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So listen ah, I picked Monica for secret Santa, but I’m already getting her something for Chanukah, I was wondering if you wanna switch.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh y’know what, I was already trying to trade for ah, well, you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really?! Wow! That’s-that’s so nice, what are you gonna get me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t know R.G., I was thinking something girlie for your office.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, well maybe Phoebe will switch with me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh no-no-no, you don’t want to do that, then you’re gonna get stuck with Rachel and she exchanges every gift she ever gets.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, that’s not true! I’ve got her lots of stuff she never took back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Like?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Like uh, that gold necklace I got her last year.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: When was the last time you saw her wear it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, she wore it all Christmas day, and then uh…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Big dog?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m sending back all this stuff that Chandler bought out of guilt.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Everything? Even the TV?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! I’m putting that in my room.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Listen, Joey, I know what he did was wrong but don’t you think you could at least hear the guy out?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Back when you and Rachel were together, if Chandler had kissed her, would you hear him out?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s a good point. So uh, how long are you gonna punish him?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Five years.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You’ve sentenced him?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Don’t do the crime if you can’t do the time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey, the guy’s your best friend.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, was my best friend. Anyway, I don’t know why you’re pushing for him so hard. With him out of the way as my best friend, there’s a spot open.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, who? Me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! I’m honored! And y’know what I’m gonna do as my first act as your best friend?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m gonna get you to talk to Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right. But if you weren’t my best friend.

utterance.speaker: KATHY
utterance.content: Oh my God, is it really that bad?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I walk into a room and he won’t even talk to me, he just mumbles something in Italian. And I know he only knows the bad words.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Gunther, have you uh, have you seen Chandler?

utterance.speaker: GUNTHER
utterance.content: I thought you were Chandler. But umm, one of who is over there.

utterance.speaker: KATHY
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Joe.

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: I’ll be right with you. Okay? Thanks, Wendy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! How cute is the on-call doctor?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ooh, so cute, that I’m thinking about jamming this pen in my eye.

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: Dr. Burke will see you know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no-no-no, not Dr. Burke. Dr. Burke is out of town. The-the on-call doctor will see me now.

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: Dr. Richard Burke is out of town. Dr. Timothy Burke, his son, will see you now.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Timothy Burke
utterance.content: Ready?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! I’m sorry! That— where are you going?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: My folks.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, uh, when-when are you coming back?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t know. I might stay there for a few days while I look for an apartment.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, y’know at first I thought we could talk about this y’know, work it out, but uh, seeing you two together I don’t think I…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, look, what do you want me to say? Do you want me to say that I’ll stop seeing her?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, it’s not about her. Okay? But seeing you two together just reminds me of what you did. And I don’t want to live with some one who doesn’t know what it is to be a friend. So, I’ll see ya.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, look, I know what it is to be a friend, I just-I just screwed up!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! You did! And that’s why I’m leaving.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right look, if you’re not gonna stay for me, then at least stay for them! Okay, they have had a very difficult year! What with the robbery and all!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: When that guy was robbing us, and I was locked in the entertainment unit for like six hours, you know what I was doing in there all that time? I was thinking about how I let you down!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! But if would’ve know what kind of friend you were gonna turn out to be, I wouldn’t have worried about it so much! See you around!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, wait! Come on! Just wait one second! There has to be something that I can do! Something! If we still had that entertainment unit I would get in it for six hours and think about how I let you down. What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We’ve got a box.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Last time I saw you, it was the morning I left for college. And you were just standing outside The Dairy Queen.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I was probably waiting for it to open.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: I gotta tell you, you look great now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You look great too.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: You’re an excellent patient!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So how does it look?

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Well, you’ve got a little scratch on your cornea, your gonna have to wear a patch for a couple of days.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Like a pirate?!

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: If that helps you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Umm, so how long have you been working with your dad? Come on, one of us had to mention him.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: I moved back here a couple of months ago.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh. Big family dinner tonight?

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Uh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No way!

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: I was gonna have Thanksgiving at my girlfriend’s.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: But we broke up.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: She-she wasn’t ready for a serious commitment.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh. So you made her walk the plank? Aye, matie?

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: You’re not wearing the patch yet.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He’s coming here for Thanksgiving!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know, it’s sick.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why is it sick?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because it’s Richard’s son! It’s like inviting Greek tragedy over for dinner!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, come on, Phoebe, you understand don’t you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I can see where I’d be your best shot but, no. I’m sorry, but I think it’s twisted.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What’s twisted?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Me going out with Richard’s son.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ewwwww!! Ew! Ew! Ew!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sounds like a really bad idea to me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Is he okay in there?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He’s fine!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, y'know, Mon, if things wrong out between you and Richard’s son, you’d be able to tell your kids, that you slept with their grandfather.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Fine! Judge all you want to but, married a lesbian, left a man at the altar, fell in love with a gay ice dancer, threw a girl’s wooden leg in a fire, livin’ in a box!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So now, what exactly is the point of the box?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The meaning of the box is three fold. One , it gives me the time to think about what I did. Two , it proves how much I care about my friendship with Joey. And three , it hurts!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh hey! Hey uh, you remember the necklace I gave you last year? Can I see it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I just wanna check something.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Now, we’ll see.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Air hole! Air hole!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Here it is! I love it. I wear it all the time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The necklace I got you was gold, this one is silver.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Huh, well maybe it uh, it changed.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God! You actually exchanged it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well isn’t it better that I exchanged it for something that I enjoy and that I can get a lot of use out of?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What did you get?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Credit.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’ll get it! I’ll get it! I’ll get it! I’ll get it! I’ll get it! I’ll get it! I’ll get it! I’ll get it! I’ll get it! I’ll get it! I’ll get it! I’ll get it! I’ll get it! I’ll get it! Hi, Tim.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you. Come meet my friends. This is uh, Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Hi, nice to meet you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Hi, Joey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: My brother, Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And Rachel. And that’s Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How do ya do.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: What’s…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Umm, well, he’s…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He’s doin’ some thinkin’!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What happened? What happened?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You kissed my girlfriend!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ooh, I like those sunglasses.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Like ‘em, like ‘em? Or, I’d like to get store credit for that amount like ‘em?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right everybody, this turkey is ready!

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Where can I wash up?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Here, let me show you. Okay, the towels are hanging next to the sink, and umm, you can use the fancy soap.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Fancy soap? I thought we were savin’ that for the Pope!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: See he’s nice. Right?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, but Monica, do you actually want to be in a relationship where you can actually use the phrase, "That’s not how your dad used to do it."

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Wow! Everything looks great! Where should I sit?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I saved you a seat.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sick-sick-sick-sick.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I’ll get it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Gotcha!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That doesn’t sound like thinking to me!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sorry!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y’know I don’t think you should be talking at all in there! I think you’ve got to much thinking to do to be talking and making jokes!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, okay, you got it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, can you pass me the yams?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure! Oh, and Joey’s got the mashed potatoes if you want to exchange them.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Would you stop?! What is the matter with you?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh-ho-ho, we’ve got company.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There’s nothing the matter with me. See, I’m not completely devoid of sentiment, see I have feelings.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, fine.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You can’t tell, but I’m trying to break the tension by mooning you guys!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, look! If this is just a big joke to you, then forget about it, all right?! This means something to me! And if it doesn’t mean anything to you, then you should get out of there, otherwise you’re just an idiot in a box!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You’re right, and I’m sorry! This means a lot to me! I want you to be my friend again! I swear, I won’t say another word tonight.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So are you gonna start taking this thing seriously?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Absolutely!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That sounds like another word to me! Are you gonna take this seriously? Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Don’t say that I have no sentiment! This is a movie stub from our first date! This is an eggshell from the first time you made me breakfast in bed! This is from the museum from the first time we… were together. Okay, maybe I exchange gifts sometimes, but I keep the things that matter!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t know what to say, I’m sorry. Though, you’re not supposed to take these. It’s like a million years old, we, we actually, we had people looking for that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ooh, this always happens.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Here, let me help.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: You-you have a very beautiful… eye.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know all my friends think this is weird.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Y’know I-I thought it was gonna be weird, I mean I almost called and canceled, but it really isn’t.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know! I mean it’s like me and your dad, that’s a totally separate thing.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Oh, I totally agree.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We’re just two people who find each other very attractive. Right?

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nothing. Nothing.

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: No-no really, was-was that not okay?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No-no-no that was good, it was, that was uh, that was a goood kiss…

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Oh my God! It didn’t remind you of…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Don’t say it!

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: No, but it did! Didn’t it?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Tim
utterance.content: Oh man!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’ll get it.

utterance.speaker: KATHY
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: KATHY
utterance.content: Hey. Listen, I want you to know how sorry I am…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s okay. Chandler’s the one I’m mad at.

utterance.speaker: KATHY
utterance.content: Well, I’m still sorry. Is he here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: In the box.

utterance.speaker: KATHY
utterance.content: Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, he-he can’t talk right now.

utterance.speaker: KATHY
utterance.content: Why not? What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: He’s just trying to show Joey how much he means to him.

utterance.speaker: KATHY
utterance.content: By being in a box?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, had reasons.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: They were threefold.

utterance.speaker: KATHY
utterance.content: Oh. Well uh, you not being able to talk may make this easier. Listen umm… Listen I don’t wanna be someone who comes between two best friends. I just, I can’t stand seeing what this is doing to you guys, and I don’t wanna be the cause of that. So, I don’t think we can see each other anymore. I’m gonna go to my mom’s in Chicago, I’m gonna stay there for awhile. I think this could’ve be something really amazing, but y’know this is probably for the best. Y’know? I’m gonna miss you. Good-bye, Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Open the box!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He can still catch her! Come on, get out of there! Get out of there!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, we’re gonna be fine! Get out!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, you did some real good thinkin’ in there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Man, this is…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now go! ‘Cause you can still catch her! And Merry Christmas from you’re secret Santa!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, who got Chandler? ‘Cause I uh, need to trade.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, he sees her!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, he’s catching up to her!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, she sees him! Oh, they’re hugging!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He’s taking her purse!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, that’s not them. I’m gonna go call the police.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, there they are!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, get a room.
